card_text: Send 1 Pyro monster from your Deck to the GY, then, if you sent a "Volcanic" monster to the GY, you can apply 1 of these effects.$N●Inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level x 100.$N●Special Summon 1 "Bomb Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 1/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponent's field. Each time 1 is destroyed, its controller takes 500 damage.$NYou can only activate 1 "Fire Ejection" per turn.
